categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: The Cobral father, wife of Zanita Cobral and father of three sons, Solan, Bard, and Rutin, was a male Fregan from the planet Frego. He died circa 44 BBY of natural causes.
The Cobral father is never canonically named, only being referred to as "Rutin's father."
